data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Parbhani, Maharashtra, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Parbhani, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 20,197 believers in Parbhani that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Parbhani, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Parbhani, Maharashtra, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Kaikadi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Parbhani, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Parbhani, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the county of Parbhani, Maharashtra, India has a population of 1,836,100.

We estimate Parbhani has 20,197 people who might know Jesus, 22,278 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,793,625 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Parbhani, Maharashtra, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
